_xResult.title: Under the Sea Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made velvet skirt with mermaid silhouette
_xResult.longdesc:
This made to measure mermaid skirt is made from black elastic velvet, which is a smoothing and stretchy fabric, perfect to emphasize and smooth your curves. The impeccable finishes and whimsical cut will have you feeling elegant and classy all evening long, no matter the occasion. Plus, there is a slit that features your left leg on the front, which elevates the mermaid silhouette to sexy sophistication.


You need a skirt made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
